{"_id":"2942","fieldName":"editors_note","documentContent":"<tag1>Binance follows best practices in terms of security protocols, and they keep a significant portion of profits aside as an insurance fund for customers who lose funds in the unlikely event of a hack. Binance also offers substantial security features which the user can deploy on their accounts for added safety. Binance is often considered one of the safest exchanges in the industry.</tag1>","html_object":[{"placeholder":"tag1","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>Binance follows best practices in terms of security protocols, and they keep a significant portion of profits aside as an insurance fund for customers who lose funds in the unlikely event of a hack. Binance also offers substantial security features which the user can deploy on their accounts for added safety. Binance is often considered one of the safest exchanges in the industry.</p>"}],"error":"Request failed with status code 404","time":"2024-06-19T11:10:52.284Z"}
{"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. {"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. {"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. {"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</tag6><tag7>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</tag7>","html_object":[{"placeholder":"tag1","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag2","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag3","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag4","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag5","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag6","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag7","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</p>"}],"error":"Request failed with status code 404","time":"2024-06-19T11:14:53.075Z"}

{"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</tag6><tag7>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</tag7>","html_object":[{"placeholder":"tag1","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. {"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</tag6><tag7>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</tag7>","html_object":[{"placeholder":"tag1","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag2","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag3","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag4","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag5","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. Der Autor schlägt vor, dass Bitcoin-Airdrops das Potenzial haben, die meisten Ethereum-NFT-Sammlungen während des aktuellen Bullenmarktes zu übertreffen.</tag2><tag3>Der Artikel geht dann zu Airdrops im Solana-Ökosystem über. Celestia, ein modulares Blockchain-Netzwerk, hatte einen erfolgreichen Airdrop, aber das Ökosystem ist noch unterentwickelt. Das Cosmos-Ökosystem verzeichnete nach anfänglicher Aufregung um Airdrops einen Rückgang der Aktivität, und während einige Airdrops wie Dymension bedeutend waren, hatten andere keinen substantiellen Wert.</tag4><tag5>Der Artikel behandelt dann Airdrops im Ethereum-Ökosystem und hebt Enttäuschungen im Bereich der L2-Lösungen hervor. Airdrops für Token wie Stark und Blast standen unter Kontroversen und Kritik, was zu einem Rückgang der Begeisterung für diese Projekte führte. Der EigenLayer-Airdrop weckte hohe Erwartungen, stieß jedoch aufgrund von Nicht-Übertragbarkeit und regionalen Beschränkungen auf Widerstand. EtherFi und Renzo hatten ebenfalls Herausforderungen mit ihren Airdrops und erlebten Wertverluste ihrer Token.</tag5><tag6>Der Artikel schließt mit dem Hinweis, dass Airdrops auf Ethereum bisher weitgehend enttäuschend waren. Die Aufmerksamkeit richtet sich nun auf LayerZero und zkSync, aber es gibt Bedenken, dass die Belohnungen unter Benutzern mit erheblicher Liquidität konzentriert sein könnten. Der Autor bewertet Airdrops von am günstigsten bis am wenigsten und identifiziert die Ökosysteme, die die erfolgreichsten Airdrops hatten.</p><p>Der Artikel beginnt damit, darauf hinzuweisen, dass Bitcoin-Airdrops nicht so erwartet wurden wie diejenigen in anderen Ökosystemen. Benutzer, die wichtige neue NFT-Sammlungen auf Bitcoin hielten, wie Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes und OPIUM, sahen eine signifikante Wertsteigerung dieser NFTs. Darüber hinaus wurden Inhaber dieser NFTs durch Airdrops mit weiteren NFTs belohnt. Der Autor schlägt vor, dass Bitcoin-Airdrops das Potenzial haben, die meisten Ethereum-NFT-Sammlungen während des aktuellen Bullenmarktes zu übertreffen.</p><p>Der Artikel geht dann zu Airdrops im Solana-Ökosystem über. Der Pyth-Airdrop, Jito-Airdrop und Bonk-Airdrop werden als große Erfolge hervorgehoben, wobei Benutzer durch diese Airdrops erhebliche Gewinne verzeichneten. Allerdings waren Airdrops von Token wie Parcl, Tensor und Kamino enttäuschend und erfüllten nicht die Erwartungen der Benutzer.</p><p>Als nächstes behandelt der Artikel Airdrops außerhalb der Solana- und Bitcoin-Ökosysteme. Celestia, ein modulares Blockchain-Netzwerk, hatte einen erfolgreichen Airdrop, aber das Ökosystem ist noch unterentwickelt. Das Cosmos-Ökosystem verzeichnete nach anfänglicher Aufregung um Airdrops einen Rückgang der Aktivität, und während einige Airdrops wie Dymension bedeutend waren, hatten andere keinen substantiellen Wert.</p><p>Der Artikel behandelt dann Airdrops im Ethereum-Ökosystem und hebt Enttäuschungen im Bereich der L2-Lösungen hervor. Airdrops für Token wie Stark und Blast standen unter Kontroversen und Kritik, was zu einem Rückgang der Begeisterung für diese Projekte führte. Der EigenLayer-Airdrop weckte hohe Erwartungen, stieß jedoch aufgrund von Nicht-Übertragbarkeit und regionalen Beschränkungen auf Widerstand. EtherFi und Renzo hatten ebenfalls Herausforderungen mit ihren Airdrops und erlebten Wertverluste ihrer Token.</p><p>Der Artikel schließt mit dem Hinweis, dass Airdrops auf Ethereum bisher weitgehend enttäuschend waren. Die Aufmerksamkeit richtet sich nun auf LayerZero und zkSync, aber es gibt Bedenken, dass die Belohnungen unter Benutzern mit erheblicher Liquidität konzentriert sein könnten. Der Autor reflektiert über die sich entwickelnde Komplexität und Durchführung von Airdrops und betont die Notwendigkeit einer fairen Verteilung.</p><p>Insgesamt bietet der Artikel eine detaillierte Analyse der wichtigsten Airdrops in verschiedenen Ökosystemen und hebt die Erfolge, Enttäuschungen und Herausforderungen im Airdrop-Bereich hervor.</p>"}

Cependant, les utilisateurs détenant des collections NFT émergentes clés sur Bitcoin, telles que Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes et OPIUM, ont vu une appréciation significative de la valeur de ces NFTs. De plus, les détenteurs de ces NFTs ont été récompensés par d'autres NFTs grâce aux airdrops. L'auteur suggère que les airdrops de Bitcoin ont le potentiel de surpasser la plupart des collections NFT sur Ethereum pendant le marché haussier actuel.</tag2><tag3>L'article passe ensuite aux airdrops dans l'écosystème Solana. Les airdrops de Pyth, Jito et Bonk sont mis en avant comme des succès majeurs, les utilisateurs ayant réalisé des gains significatifs grâce à ces airdrops. Cependant, les airdrops de tokens comme Parcl, Tensor et Kamino ont été décevants et n'ont pas répondu aux attentes des utilisateurs.</tag3><tag4>Ensuite, l'article aborde les airdrops en dehors des écosystèmes Solana et Bitcoin. Celestia, un réseau blockchain modulaire, a connu un airdrop réussi, mais l'écosystème est encore sous-développé. L'écosystème Cosmos a connu une baisse d'activité après l'engouement initial autour des airdrops, et bien que certains airdrops comme Dymension aient été significatifs, d'autres n'avaient pas de valeur substantielle.</tag4><tag5>L'article aborde ensuite les airdrops dans l'écosystème Ethereum, mettant en avant les déceptions dans le domaine des solutions L2. Les airdrops pour des tokens comme Stark et Blast ont été controversés et critiqués, entraînant une baisse de l'enthousiasme pour ces projets. L'airdrop d'EigenLayer a suscité de grandes attentes mais a fait face à des réactions négatives en raison de sa non-transférabilité et des restrictions régionales. EtherFi et Renzo ont également rencontré des défis avec leurs airdrops et ont connu des baisses de la valeur des tokens.</tag5><tag6>L'article conclut en suggérant que les airdrops sur Ethereum ont été globalement décevants jusqu'à présent. L'attention se tourne maintenant vers LayerZero et zkSync, mais il y a des préoccupations que les récompenses puissent être concentrées parmi les utilisateurs avec une liquidité substantielle. L'auteur réfléchit à la complexité et à l'exécution évolutives des airdrops, en soulignant la nécessité d'une distribution équitable.</tag6><tag7>Dans l'ensemble, l'article fournit une analyse détaillée des principaux airdrops dans différents écosystèmes et met en avant les succès, les déceptions et les défis dans le paysage des airdrops.</tag7>","modified_html_content":"<p>Dans cet article, l'auteur réalise une évaluation complète des principaux airdrops dans le domaine des cryptomonnaies. L'auteur classe les airdrops du plus favorable au moins favorable et identifie les écosystèmes qui ont connu les airdrops les plus réussis.</p><p>L'article commence par souligner que les airdrops de Bitcoin n'étaient pas aussi attendus que ceux des autres écosystèmes. Cependant, les utilisateurs détenant des collections NFT émergentes clés sur Bitcoin, telles que Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes et OPIUM, ont vu une appréciation significative de la valeur de ces NFTs. De plus, les détenteurs de ces NFTs ont été récompensés par d'autres NFTs grâce aux airdrops. L'auteur suggère que les airdrops de Bitcoin ont le potentiel de surpasser la plupart des collections NFT sur Ethereum pendant le marché haussier actuel.</p><p>L'article passe ensuite aux airdrops dans l'écosystème Solana. Les airdrops de Pyth, Jito et Bonk sont mis en avant comme des succès majeurs, les utilisateurs ayant réalisé des gains significatifs grâce à ces airdrops. Cependant, les airdrops de tokens comme Parcl, Tensor et Kamino ont été décevants et n'ont pas répondu aux attentes des utilisateurs.</p><p>Ensuite, l'article aborde les airdrops en dehors des écosystèmes Solana et Bitcoin. Celestia, un réseau blockchain modulaire, a connu un airdrop réussi, mais l'écosystème est encore sous-développé. L'écosystème Cosmos a connu une baisse d'activité après l'engouement initial autour des airdrops, et bien que certains airdrops comme Dymension aient été significatifs, d'autres n'avaient pas de valeur substantielle.</p><p>L'article aborde ensuite les airdrops dans l'écosystème Ethereum, mettant en avant les déceptions dans le domaine des solutions L2. Les airdrops pour des tokens comme Stark et Blast ont été controversés et critiqués, entraînant une baisse de l'enthousiasme pour ces projets. L'airdrop d'EigenLayer a suscité de grandes attentes mais a fait face à des réactions négatives en raison de sa non-transférabilité et des restrictions régionales. EtherFi et Renzo ont également rencontré des défis avec leurs airdrops et ont connu des baisses de la valeur des tokens.</p><p>L'article conclut en suggérant que les airdrops sur Ethereum ont été globalement décevants jusqu'à présent. L'attention se tourne maintenant vers LayerZero et zkSync, mais il y a des préoccupations que les récompenses puissent être concentrées parmi les utilisateurs avec une liquidité substantielle. L'auteur réfléchit à la complexité et à l'exécution évolutives des airdrops, en soulignant la nécessité d'une distribution équitable.</p><p>Dans l'ensemble, l'article fournit une analyse détaillée des principaux airdrops dans différents écosystèmes et met en avant les succès, les déceptions et les défis dans le paysage des airdrops.</p>"}

Los airdrops de Pyth, Jito y Bonk se destacan como grandes éxitos, con los usuarios viendo ganancias significativas a través de estos airdrops. Sin embargo, los airdrops de tokens como Parcl, Tensor y Kamino fueron decepcionantes y no cumplieron con las expectativas de los usuarios.</tag3><tag4>A continuación, el artículo discute los airdrops fuera de los ecosistemas de Solana y Bitcoin. Celestia, una red blockchain modular, tuvo un airdrop exitoso, pero el ecosistema aún está subdesarrollado. El ecosistema de Cosmos vio una disminución en la actividad después de la emoción inicial alrededor de los airdrops, y aunque algunos airdrops como Dymension fueron significativos, otros no tuvieron un valor sustancial.</tag4><tag5>El artículo luego aborda los airdrops en el ecosistema de Ethereum, destacando las decepciones en el dominio de las soluciones L2. Los airdrops para tokens como Stark y Blast enfrentaron controversias y críticas, lo que llevó a una disminución en el entusiasmo por estos proyectos. El airdrop de EigenLayer generó altas expectativas pero enfrentó reacciones negativas debido a la no transferibilidad y las restricciones regionales. EtherFi y Renzo también enfrentaron desafíos con sus airdrops y experimentaron disminuciones en el valor del token.</tag5><tag6>El artículo concluye sugiriendo que los airdrops en Ethereum han sido en gran medida decepcionantes hasta ahora. La atención ahora se centra en LayerZero y zkSync, pero hay preocupaciones de que las recompensas puedan concentrarse entre los usuarios con una liquidez sustancial. El autor reflexiona sobre la creciente complejidad y ejecución de los airdrops, enfatizando la necesidad de una distribución equitativa.</tag6><tag7>En general, el artículo proporciona un análisis detallado de los principales airdrops en diferentes ecosistemas y destaca los éxitos, decepciones y desafíos dentro del panorama de los airdrops.</tag7>","modified_html_content":"<p>En este artículo, el autor realiza una evaluación integral de los principales airdrops en el espacio de las criptomonedas. El autor clasifica los airdrops de más favorables a menos y identifica los ecosistemas que han tenido los airdrops más exitosos.</p><p>El artículo comienza destacando que los airdrops de Bitcoin no fueron tan anticipados como los de otros ecosistemas. Sin embargo, los usuarios que poseían colecciones emergentes clave de NFT en Bitcoin, como Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes y OPIUM, vieron una apreciación significativa en el valor de estos NFTs. Además, los poseedores de estos NFTs fueron recompensados con más NFTs a través de airdrops. El autor sugiere que los airdrops de Bitcoin tienen el potencial de superar a la mayoría de las colecciones de NFT de Ethereum durante el actual mercado alcista.</p><p>El artículo luego pasa a los airdrops en el ecosistema de Solana. Los airdrops de Pyth, Jito y Bonk se destacan como grandes éxitos, con los usuarios viendo ganancias significativas a través de estos airdrops. Sin embargo, los airdrops de tokens como Parcl, Tensor y Kamino fueron decepcionantes y no cumplieron con las expectativas de los usuarios.</p><p>A continuación, el artículo discute los airdrops fuera de los ecosistemas de Solana y Bitcoin. Celestia, una red blockchain modular, tuvo un airdrop exitoso, pero el ecosistema aún está subdesarrollado. El ecosistema de Cosmos vio una disminución en la actividad después de la emoción inicial alrededor de los airdrops, y aunque algunos airdrops como Dymension fueron significativos, otros no tuvieron un valor sustancial.</p><p>El artículo luego aborda los airdrops en el ecosistema de Ethereum, destacando las decepciones en el dominio de las soluciones L2. Los airdrops para tokens como Stark y Blast enfrentaron controversias y críticas, lo que llevó a una disminución en el entusiasmo por estos proyectos. El airdrop de EigenLayer generó altas expectativas pero enfrentó reacciones negativas debido a la no transferibilidad y las restricciones regionales. EtherFi y Renzo también enfrentaron desafíos con sus airdrops y experimentaron disminuciones en el valor del token.</p><p>El artículo concluye sugiriendo que los airdrops en Ethereum han sido en gran medida decepcionantes hasta ahora. La atención ahora se centra en LayerZero y zkSync, pero hay preocupaciones de que las recompensas puedan concentrarse entre los usuarios con una liquidez sustancial. El autor reflexiona sobre la creciente complejidad y ejecución de los airdrops, enfatizando la necesidad de una distribución equitativa.</p><p>En general, el artículo proporciona un análisis detallado de los principales airdrops en diferentes ecosistemas y destaca los éxitos, decepciones y desafíos dentro del panorama de los airdrops.</p>"}

Anon!</tag1><tag2>Heute werden wir eine umfassende Bewertung der wichtigsten Ereignisse, die bisher stattgefunden haben, vornehmen. Wir werden die Orte untersuchen, an denen die Benutzer die meisten Informationen erhalten haben, und die neu aufkommenden Probleme im Bereich der Airdrops untersuchen.</tag2><tag3>Die am meisten erwartete Airdrop-Saison in der Geschichte des Kryptomarktes hat bereits begonnen, aber in Wirklichkeit sind die Erwartungen nicht immer erfüllt worden und nur bestimmte Ökosystemnutzer haben große Renditen erzielt.</tag3><tag4>Lasst uns anfangen!</tag4><tag5><tag6></tag6></tag5><tag7>Befürworter und Gegner der Airdrop-Saison</tag7><tag8>Der Markt hat sich stabilisiert und zeigt derzeit keine klaren Trends, was den aktuellen Zustand der Airdrops widerspiegelt. In diesem Abschnitt werden wir die Ökosysteme identifizieren, die als die erfolgreichsten gelten, nachdem der Bullenmarkt beendet ist und der Markt als am erfolgreichsten angesehen wird. Die erfolgreichsten Airdrops halten weiterhin eine sehr starke Community aufrecht und haben eine hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, weiterhin erfolgreich zu sein.</tag8><tag10><tag11>.code-block-tip blockquote {    margin-left: 0;    font-size: 14px;    font-weight: 500;    padding-left: 30px;    line-height: 1.75rem;    margin-block-end: 2em;    letter-spacing: 0.04em;    word-break: break-word;    margin-block-start: 0em;    border-left: 3px solid yellow;}.code-block-tip-description-div{    font-weight:800px;}</tag11><tag12><tag13><tag14><tag15>**Profi-Tipp**</tag15> Um Ihre Online-Sicherheit zu stärken, verwenden Sie ein <tag16>starkes VPN</tag16>, um Ihre Web-Traffic und Online-Identität zu anonymisieren. Dies ist besonders wichtig beim Handel und der Durchführung von Finanztransaktionen.</tag14></tag13></tag12></tag10><tag17>?Erster Preis für den König: Bitcoin</tag17><tag18>In tieferem Sinne suchen Nutzer, die stark in Airdrops involviert sind, nach anderen Orten als Bitcoin. Der Grund für diese Beobachtung ist insbesondere die mäßige Nutzererfahrung im Vergleich zu Bitcoins spekulativer Natur. Dies hat jedoch Vorteile für Bitcoin, da es mehr Nutzer anzieht und die Teilnahme als Hürde fungiert. Die Hauptneuenheiten von Bitcoin NFTs (Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, O.P.I.U.M usw.) haben ihren Wert um ein Vielfaches erhöht.</tag18><tag19><tag20/></tag19><tag21>Darüber hinaus haben Benutzer, die diese NFTs besitzen, viele weitere NFTs als Belohnung erhalten. Runestones, Runepups, RSIC Metaprotocol, Prometheans und andere NFTs wurden diesen Sammlern als Airdrops zugeteilt.</tag21><tag22><tag23/></tag22><tag24>Das war's für heute, Anon!</tag24><tag25><tag26>Hat Ihnen dieser Artikel gefallen?</tag26></tag25><tag27><tag28><tag29>Crypto Pragmatist von M6 Labs</tag29> Abonnieren Sie den Newsletter und erhalten Sie Forschungen und Einblicke in die Welt der Kryptomärkte, die von über 30.000 Lesern gelesen werden.</tag28><tag30><tag31>Folgen Sie uns auf Twitter</tag31> für aktuelle Tweets, die tiefgehende Einblicke in die Welt der Kryptowährungen bieten.     <tag32/> </tag30></tag27>","modified_html_content":"<p>GM Anon!</p><p>Heute werden wir eine umfassende Bewertung der wichtigsten Ereignisse, die bisher stattgefunden haben, vornehmen. Wir werden die Orte untersuchen, an denen die Benutzer die meisten Informationen erhalten haben, und die neu aufkommenden Probleme im Bereich der Airdrops untersuchen.</p><p>Die am meisten erwartete Airdrop-Saison in der Geschichte des Kryptomarktes hat bereits begonnen, aber in Wirklichkeit sind die Erwartungen nicht immer erfüllt worden und nur bestimmte Ökosystemnutzer haben große Renditen erzielt.</p><p>Lasst uns anfangen!</p><div class=\"raw-html-embed\"><deals-cta-1></deals-cta-1></div><h2>Befürworter und Gegner der Airdrop-Saison</h2><p>Der Markt hat sich stabilisiert und zeigt derzeit keine klaren Trends, was den aktuellen Zustand der Airdrops widerspiegelt. In diesem Abschnitt werden wir die Ökosysteme identifizieren, die als die erfolgreichsten gelten, nachdem der Bullenmarkt beendet ist und der Markt als am erfolgreichsten angesehen wird. Die erfolgreichsten Airdrops halten weiterhin eine sehr starke Community aufrecht und haben eine hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, weiterhin erfolgreich zu sein.</p><div class=\"raw-html-embed\"><style type=\"text/css\">.code-block-tip blockquote {    margin-left: 0;    font-size: 14px;    font-weight: 500;    padding-left: 30px;    line-height: 1.75rem;    margin-block-end: 2em;    letter-spacing: 0.04em;    word-break: break-word;    margin-block-start: 0em;    border-left: 3px solid yellow;}.code-block-tip-description-div{    font-weight:800px;}</style><div class=\"code-block-tip\"><blockquote><div class=\"code-block-tip-description-div\"><b>**Profi-Tipp**</b> Um Ihre Online-Sicherheit zu stärken, verwenden Sie ein <a href=\"https://go.coinbureau.com/expressvpn\" target=\"_blank\">starkes VPN</a>, um Ihre Web-Traffic und Online-Identität zu anonymisieren. Dies ist besonders wichtig beim Handel und der Durchführung von Finanztransaktionen.</div></blockquote></div></div><h3>?Erster Preis für den König: Bitcoin</h3><p>In tieferem Sinne suchen Nutzer, die stark in Airdrops involviert sind, nach anderen Orten als Bitcoin. Der Grund für diese Beobachtung ist insbesondere die mäßige Nutzererfahrung im Vergleich zu Bitcoins spekulativer Natur. Dies hat jedoch Vorteile für Bitcoin, da es mehr Nutzer anzieht und die Teilnahme als Hürde fungiert. Die Hauptneuenheiten von Bitcoin NFTs (Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, O.P.I.U.M usw.) haben ihren Wert um ein Vielfaches erhöht.</p><figure style=\"width:50%;\" class=\"image image_resized\"><img src=\"https://image.coinbureau.dev/strapi/image_d3b15e3ad2.png\"></figure><p>Darüber hinaus haben Benutzer, die diese NFTs besitzen, viele weitere NFTs als Belohnung erhalten. Runestones, Runepups, RSIC Metaprotocol, Prometheans und andere NFTs wurden diesen Sammlern als Airdrops zugeteilt.</p><p><img src=\"https://image.coinbureau.dev/strapi/image_d0901f54dc.png\"></p><p>Das war's für heute, Anon!</p><p><strong>Hat Ihnen dieser Artikel gefallen?</strong></p><ol><li><a href=\"https://cryptopragmatist.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Crypto Pragmatist von M6 Labs</a> Abonnieren Sie den Newsletter und erhalten Sie Forschungen und Einblicke in die Welt der Kryptomärkte, die von über 30.000 Lesern gelesen werden.</li><li><a href=\"https://twitter.com/M6Labs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Folgen Sie uns auf Twitter</a> für aktuelle Tweets, die tiefgehende Einblicke in die Welt der Kryptowährungen bieten.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br></li></ol>"}

Anon!</tag1><tag2>Hoy realizaremos una evaluación exhaustiva de los principales airdrops que han ocurrido hasta ahora. Los usuarios investigarán los lugares donde se han obtenido la mayoría de las recompensas y explorarán los nuevos problemas que están surgiendo en el campo de los airdrops.</tag2><tag3>Se esperaba la temporada de airdrops más grande de la historia del criptomercado, pero la realidad ha sido menos emocionante, con ciertos usuarios del ecosistema experimentando un retorno significativo.</tag3><tag4>¡Vamos a empezar!</tag4><tag5><tag6></tag6></tag5><tag7>Ganadores y perdedores de la temporada de airdrops</tag7><tag8>El estado actual de los airdrops muestra que el mercado se ha vuelto más selectivo y menos directo. En esta sección, clasificaremos desde los más beneficiosos hasta los menos rentables, y determinaremos qué ecosistemas se consideran los más exitosos una vez que el mercado haya concluido este ciclo. Los ecosistemas que sostienen los airdrops más exitosos tienen una alta probabilidad de desarrollar una comunidad muy fuerte y continuar con un alto rendimiento.</tag8><tag9/> <tag10><tag11>.code-block-tip blockquote {    margin-left: 0;    font-size: 14px;    font-weight: 500;    padding-left: 30px;    line-height: 1.75rem;    margin-block-end: 2em;    letter-spacing: 0.04em;    word-break: break-word;    margin-block-start: 0em;    border-left: 3px solid yellow;}.code-block-tip-description-div{    font-weignt:800px;}</tag11><tag12><tag13><tag14><tag15>**Consejo Pro**</tag15> Para fortalecer tu seguridad en línea, utiliza una <tag16>VPN potente</tag16> para anonimizar tu tráfico web e identidad en línea. Esto es especialmente importante al realizar transacciones financieras y comerciales en criptomonedas.</tag14></tag13></tag12></tag10><tag17>?Primer Premio Al Rey: Bitcoin</tag17><tag18>Los usuarios que tienen una comprensión profunda y están bien establecidos en los airdrops están buscando otros lugares más allá de Bitcoin. Esta tendencia se debe principalmente a la experiencia de los usuarios que están interesados en colecciones de NFT nuevas y principales de Bitcoin (Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, O.P.I.U.M, etc.).</tag18><tag19><tag20/></tag19><tag21>Además, los usuarios que poseen estos NFT han recibido más recompensas en forma de NFT. Runestones, Runepups, RSIC Metaprotocol, Prometheans, y otras colecciones de NFT fueron airdropeadas a los propietarios de estas colecciones.</tag21><tag22><tag23/></tag22><tag24>Eso es todo por hoy, ¡Anon!</tag24><tag25><tag26>¿Disfrutaste este artículo?</tag26></tag25><tag27><tag28><tag29>Crypto Pragmatist por M6 Labs</tag29> Suscríbete al boletín de noticias y únete a más de 30k lectores que reciben investigaciones y análisis profundos del mundo de las criptomonedas</tag28><tag30><tag31>Síguenos en Twitter</tag31> para recibir tweets que proporcionan investigación sobre los usuarios, constructores y líderes en el campo de las criptomonedas</tag30><tag32/> </tag27>","modified_html_content":"<p>¡GM Anon!</p><p>Hoy realizaremos una evaluación exhaustiva de los principales airdrops que han ocurrido hasta ahora. Los usuarios investigarán los lugares donde se han obtenido la mayoría de las recompensas y explorarán los nuevos problemas que están surgiendo en el campo de los airdrops.</p><p>Se esperaba la temporada de airdrops más grande de la historia del criptomercado, pero la realidad ha sido menos emocionante, con ciertos usuarios del ecosistema experimentando un retorno significativo.</p><p>¡Vamos a empezar!</p><div class=\"raw-html-embed\"><deals-cta-1></deals-cta-1></div><h2>Ganadores y perdedores de la temporada de airdrops</h2><p>El estado actual de los airdrops muestra que el mercado se ha vuelto más selectivo y menos directo. En esta sección, clasificaremos desde los más beneficiosos hasta los menos rentables, y determinaremos qué ecosistemas se consideran los más exitosos una vez que el mercado haya concluido este ciclo. Los ecosistemas que sostienen los airdrops más exitosos tienen una alta probabilidad de desarrollar una comunidad muy fuerte y continuar con un alto rendimiento.</p><br>"}

Anon!</tag1><tag2>Aujourd'hui, nous procéderons à une évaluation globale des principaux développements aériens survenus jusqu'à présent. Nous examinerons les endroits où les utilisateurs ont obtenu les rapports les plus nombreux et explorerons les nouveaux défis émergents dans le domaine des développements aériens.</tag2><tag3>La saison des développements aériens la plus importante de l'histoire de l'aviation était attendue, mais en réalité, elle a été très décevante, avec de nombreux utilisateurs d'un certain écosystème ayant une expérience de retour importante.</tag3><tag4>Commençons tout de suite !</tag4><tag5><tag6></tag6></tag5><tag7>Les partisans et les opposants de la saison des développements aériens</tag7><tag8>Le marché montre actuellement une volatilité accrue, indiquant qu'il n'est pas aussi stable qu'il pourrait l'être. Dans cette section, nous classerons des écosystèmes spécifiques selon leur succès perçu lorsque ce marché bouleversé se sera terminé. Les écosystèmes les plus réussis maintiennent une communauté très forte, offrant des possibilités élevées de continuer à performer.</tag9> </tag8><tag10><tag11>.code-block-tip blockquote {    margin-left: 0;    font-size: 14px;    font-weight: 500;    padding-left: 30px;    line-height: 1.75rem;    margin-block-end: 2em;    letter-spacing: 0.04em;    word-break: break-word;    margin-block-start: 0em;    border-left: 3px solid yellow;}.code-block-tip-description-div{    font-weignt:800px;}</tag11><tag12><tag13><tag14><tag15>**Conseil Pro**</tag15> Pour renforcer votre sécurité en ligne, utilisez un <tag16>VPN puissant</tag16> pour masquer votre trafic Web et votre identité en ligne. Cela est particulièrement important lorsque vous effectuez des transactions financières ou des transactions en crypto-monnaie.</tag14></tag13></tag12></tag10><tag17>?Premier Prix au Roi : Bitcoin</tag17><tag18>Les utilisateurs profondément ancrés dans les développements aériens recherchent des endroits autres que le Bitcoin pour diversifier leurs investissements. La raison de cette tendance est principalement due à l'expérience utilisateur impressionnante du Bitcoin. Cependant, cela a profité au Bitcoin car il a limité la participation de nombreux utilisateurs, les laissant en dehors du processus. Les utilisateurs qui possèdent les principaux nouveaux NFT du Bitcoin (Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, O.P.I.U.M, etc.) ont vu la valeur de ces NFT monter en flèche.</tag18><tag19><tag20/></tag19><tag21>De plus, les utilisateurs qui détenaient ces NFT ont également reçu de nombreux autres NFT en récompense. Les NFT tels que Runestones, Runepups, RSIC Metaprotocol, Prometheans, etc., ont été distribués aux détenteurs de cette collection.</tag21><tag22><tag23/></tag22><tag24>C'est tout pour aujourd'hui, Anon !</tag24><tag25><tag26>Avez-vous apprécié cet article ?</tag26></tag25><tag27><tag28><tag29>Crypto Pragmatist par M6 Labs</tag29> Inscrivez-vous à notre newsletter et rejoignez plus de 30 000 abonnés qui explorent et recherchent dans le domaine des transactions en crypto-monnaie</tag28><tag30><tag31>Suivez-nous sur Twitter</tag31> pour des enquêtes approfondies sur les utilisateurs, les constructeurs et les leaders du secteur des transactions en crypto-monnaie.     <tag32/> </tag30></tag27>\n```","modified_html_content":"```html<p>GM Anon!</p><p>Aujourd'hui, nous procéderons à une évaluation globale des principaux développements aériens survenus jusqu'à présent. Nous examinerons les endroits où les utilisateurs ont obtenu les rapports les plus nombreux et explorerons les nouveaux défis émergents dans le domaine des développements aériens.</p><p>La saison des développements aériens la plus importante de l'histoire de l'aviation était attendue, mais en réalité, elle a été très décevante, avec de nombreux utilisateurs d'un certain écosystème ayant une expérience de retour importante.</p><p>Commençons tout de suite !</p><div class=\"raw-html-embed\"><deals-cta-1></deals-cta-1></div><h2>Les partisans et les opposants de la saison des développements aériens</h2><p>Le marché montre actuellement une volatilité accrue, indiquant qu'il n'est pas aussi stable qu'il pourrait l'être. Dans cette section, nous classerons des écosystèmes spécifiques selon leur succès perçu lorsque ce marché bouleversé se sera terminé. Les écosystèmes les plus réussis maintiennent une communauté très forte, offrant des possibilités élevées de continuer à performer.&nbsp;</p><div class=\"raw-html-embed\"><style type=\"text/css\">.code-block-tip blockquote {    margin-left: 0;    font-size: 14px;    font-weight: 500;    padding-left: 30px;    line-height: 1.75rem;    margin-block-end: 2em;    letter-spacing: 0.04em;    word-break: break-word;    margin-block-start: 0em;    border-left: 3px solid yellow;}.code-block-tip-description-div{    font-weignt:800px;}</style><div class=\"code-block-tip\"><blockquote><div class=\"code-block-tip-description-div\"><b>**Conseil Pro**</b> Pour renforcer votre sécurité en ligne, utilisez un <a href=\"https://go.coinbureau.com/expressvpn\" target=\"_blank\">VPN puissant</a> pour masquer votre trafic Web et votre identité en ligne. Cela est particulièrement important lorsque vous effectuez des transactions financières ou des transactions en crypto-monnaie.</div></blockquote></div></div><h3>?Premier Prix au Roi : Bitcoin</h3><p>Les utilisateurs profondément ancrés dans les développements aériens recherchent des endroits autres que le Bitcoin pour diversifier leurs investissements. La raison de cette tendance est principalement due à l'expérience utilisateur impressionnante du Bitcoin. Cependant, cela a profité au Bitcoin car il a limité la participation de nombreux utilisateurs, les laissant en dehors du processus. Les utilisateurs qui possèdent les principaux nouveaux NFT du Bitcoin (Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, O.P.I.U.M, etc.) ont vu la valeur de ces NFT monter en flèche.</p><figure style=\"width:50%;\" class=\"image image_resized\"><img src=\"https://image.coinbureau.dev/strapi/image_d3b15e3ad2.png\"></figure><p>De plus, les utilisateurs qui détenaient ces NFT ont également reçu de nombreux autres NFT en récompense. Les NFT tels que Runestones, Runepups, RSIC Metaprotocol, Prometheans, etc., ont été distribués aux détenteurs de cette collection.</p><p><img src=\"https://image.coinbureau.dev/strapi/image_d0901f54dc.png\"></p><p>C'est tout pour aujourd'hui, Anon !</p><p><strong>Avez-vous apprécié cet article ?</strong></p><ol><li><a href=\"https://cryptopragmatist.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Crypto Pragmatist par M6 Labs</a> Inscrivez-vous à notre newsletter et rejoignez plus de 30 000 abonnés qui explorent et recherchent dans le domaine des transactions en crypto-monnaie</li><li><a href=\"https://twitter.com/M6Labs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Suivez-nous sur Twitter</a> pour des enquêtes approfondies sur les utilisateurs, les constructeurs et les leaders du secteur des transactions en crypto-monnaie.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br></li></ol>```"}

King: Bitcoin</h3><p>興味深いことに、エアドロップに固執しているユーザーは、ビットコイン以外のあらゆる場所を探しているようでした。この現象の理由は、特にビットコインの客観的にひどいユーザー体験にあります。しかし、これはビットコインにとって有利に働き、多くのユーザーを惹きつけ、参加を制限する障壁として機能しました。ビットコインの主要な新興NFTコレクション（Bitcoin Puppets、Quantum Cats、NodeMonkes、O.P.I.U.Mなど）を保有していたユーザーは、これらのNFTの価格が何倍も上昇するのを見ました。</p><figure style=\"width:50%;\" class=\"image image_resized\"><img {"_id":"2942","fieldName":"content_summary","chunks":["<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</tag6><tag7>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</tag7>"],"documentContent":"<tag1>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. The author ranks airdrops from most favorable to least and identifies the ecosystems that have had the most successful airdrops.</tag1><tag2>The article begins by highlighting that Bitcoin airdrops were not as anticipated as those in other ecosystems. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</tag2><tag3>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</tag3><tag4>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Celestia, a modular blockchain network, had a successful airdrop, but the ecosystem is still underdeveloped. The Cosmos ecosystem saw a decline in activity after initial excitement around airdrops, and while some airdrops like Dymension were significant, others did not have substantial value.</tag4><tag5>The article then addresses airdrops in the Ethereum ecosystem, highlighting disappointments in the L2 solutions domain. Airdrops for tokens like Stark and Blast faced controversy and criticism, leading to a decline in enthusiasm for these projects. EigenLayer's airdrop generated high expectations but faced backlash due to nontransferability and regional restrictions. EtherFi and Renzo also faced challenges with their airdrops and experienced declines in token value.</tag5><tag6>The article concludes by suggesting that airdrops on Ethereum have been largely disappointing so far. Attention now shifts to LayerZero and zkSync, but there are concerns that rewards may be concentrated among users with substantial liquidity. The author reflects on the evolving complexity and execution of airdrops, emphasizing the need for fair distribution.</tag6><tag7>Overall, the article provides a detailed analysis of major airdrops in different ecosystems and highlights the successes, disappointments, and challenges within the airdrop landscape.</tag7>","html_object":[{"placeholder":"tag1","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>In this article, the author conducts a comprehensive assessment of major airdrops in the cryptocurrency space. However, users holding key emerging NFT collections on Bitcoin, such as Bitcoin Puppets, Quantum Cats, NodeMonkes, and OPIUM, saw significant appreciation in the value of these NFTs. Additionally, holders of these NFTs were rewarded with more NFTs through airdrops. The author suggests that Bitcoin's airdrops have the potential to outperform most Ethereum NFT collections during the current bull market.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag3","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>The article then moves on to airdrops in the Solana ecosystem. The Pyth airdrop, Jito airdrop, and Bonk airdrop are highlighted as major successes, with users seeing significant gains through these airdrops. However, airdrops of tokens like Parcl, Tensor, and Kamino were underwhelming and did not meet users' expectations.</p>"},{"placeholder":"tag4","original_tag":"p","original_content":"<p>Next, the article discusses airdrops outside the Solana and Bitcoin ecosystems. Puppets、Quantum Cats、NodeMonkes、OPIUMなど）を保有しているユーザーは、これらのNFTの価値が大幅に上昇したことを確認しました。さらに、これらのNFTの保有者はエアドロップを通じてさらに多くのNFTを受け取りました。著者は、ビットコインのエアドロップが現在の強気市場において、ほとんどのイーサリアムNFTコレクションを上回る可能性があると示唆しています。</tag2><tag3>次に、記事はソラナエコシステムのエアドロップに移ります。Pythエアドロップ、Jitoエアドロップ、およびBonkエアドロップは大成功とされ、ユーザーはこれらのエアドロップを通じて大きな利益を見ました。しかし、Parcl、Tensor、およびKaminoのトークンのエアドロップは期待外れで、ユーザーの期待に応えませんでした。</tag3><tag4>次に、記事はソラナおよびビットコインエコシステム外のエアドロップについて議論します。モジュラーブロックチェーンネットワークであるCelestiaは成功したエアドロップを実施しましたが、エコシステムはまだ未発達です。Cosmosエコシステムは、エアドロップをめぐる初期の興奮の後、活動が減少しました。Dymensionのような一部のエアドロップは重要でしたが、他のエアドロップは実質的な価値を持っていませんでした。</tag4><tag5>次に、記事はイーサリアムエコシステムのエアドロップに言及し、L2ソリューション領域での失望を強調しています。StarkやBlastのトークンのエアドロップは論争と批判に直面し、これらのプロジェクトに対する熱意が低下しました。EigenLayerのエアドロップは高い期待を集めましたが、譲渡不可性と地域制限のために反発を受けました。EtherFiとRenzoもエアドロップで課題に直面し、トークン価値の低下を経験しました。</tag5><tag6>この記事は、イーサリアム上のエアドロップがこれまでのところ大部分が失望に終わっていることを示唆して結論づけています。注目は現在LayerZeroとzkSyncに移っていますが、報酬が大規模な流動性を持つユーザーに集中する懸念があります。著者は、エアドロップの複雑性と実行が進化していることを反映し、公平な分配の必要性を強調しています。</tag6><tag7>全体として、この記事は異なるエコシステムにおける主要なエアドロップの詳細な分析を提供し、エアドロップの成功、失望、および課題を強調しています。</tag7>","modified_html_content":"<p>この記事では、著者が暗号通貨分野の主要なエアドロップに関する包括的な評価を行っています。著者はエアドロップを最も好ましいものから最も好ましくないものまでランク付けし、最も成功したエアドロップを実施したエコシステムを特定しています。</p><p>この記事は、ビットコインのエアドロップが他のエコシステムほど期待されていなかったことを強調することから始まります。しかし、ビットコインの主要な新興NFTコレクション（Bitcoin Puppets、Quantum Cats、NodeMonkes、OPIUMなど）を保有しているユーザーは、これらのNFTの価値が大幅に上昇したことを確認しました。さらに、これらのNFTの保有者はエアドロップを通じてさらに多くのNFTを受け取りました。著者は、ビットコインのエアドロップが現在の強気市場において、ほとんどのイーサリアムNFTコレクションを上回る可能性があると示唆しています。</p><p>次に、記事はソラナエコシステムのエアドロップに移ります。Pythエアドロップ、Jitoエアドロップ、およびBonkエアドロップは大成功とされ、ユーザーはこれらのエアドロップを通じて大きな利益を見ました。しかし、Parcl、Tensor、およびKaminoのトークンのエアドロップは期待外れで、ユーザーの期待に応えませんでした。</p><p>次に、記事はソラナおよびビットコインエコシステム外のエアドロップについて議論します。モジュラーブロックチェーンネットワークであるCelestiaは成功したエアドロップを実施しましたが、エコシステムはまだ未発達です。Cosmosエコシステムは、エアドロップをめぐる初期の興奮の後、活動が減少しました。Dymensionのような一部のエアドロップは重要でしたが、他のエアドロップは実質的な価値を持っていませんでした。</p><p>次に、記事はイーサリアムエコシステムのエアドロップに言及し、L2ソリューション領域での失望を強調しています。StarkやBlastのトークンのエアドロップは論争と批判に直面し、これらのプロジェクトに対する熱意が低下しました。EigenLayerのエアドロップは高い期待を集めましたが、譲渡不可性と地域制限のために反発を受けました。EtherFiとRenzoもエアドロップで課題に直面し、トークン価値の低下を経験しました。</p><p>この記事は、イーサリアム上のエアドロップがこれまでのところ大部分が失望に終わっていることを示唆して結論づけています。注目は現在LayerZeroとzkSyncに移っていますが、報酬が大規模な流動性を持つユーザーに集中する懸念があります。著者は、エアドロップの複雑性と実行が進化していることを反映し、公平な分配の必要性を強調しています。</p><p>全体として、この記事は異なるエコシステムにおける主要なエアドロップの詳細な分析を提供し、エアドロップの成功、失望、および課題を強調しています。</p>"}
